languages.text: {n}Изувеченное существо у ваших ног еще живо, о чем свидетельствуют тяжелое дыхание. Когда-то оно было женщиной, по-солдатски коротко стриженной и затянутой в боевую экипировку. Но сейчас кожа ее прорвана в дюжине мест торчащим металлом.{/n}

{n}The maimed creature at your feet is still alive, as evidenced by its heavy breathing. It was a woman once, sporting close-cropped hair and equipped for battle. But now her skin is shredded by the metal sticking out of her body in a dozen places.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Изувеченное существо у ваших ног еще живо, о чем свидетельствуют тяжелое дыхание. Когда-то оно было женщиной, по-солдатски коротко стриженной и затянутой в боевую экипировку. Но сейчас кожа ее прорвана в дюжине мест торчащим металлом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The mutilated creature at your feet is still alive, as evident by heavy breathing. It was a woman once, with soldier-like close-clipped hair and clad in battle equipment. But now her skin is torn by the metal sticking out of her body in a dozen places.{/n}

{n}The mutilated creature at your feet is still alive, as evident by heavy breathing. It was a woman once, with soldier-like close-clipped hair and clad in battle equipment. But now her skin is torn by the metal sticking out of her body in a dozen places.{/n}

{n}The maimed creature at your feet is still alive, as evidenced by heavy breathing. It was a woman once, flaunting a military-style buzz cut and equipped for the battle. But now her skin is torn by the metal sticking out of her body in a dozen places.{/n}

{n}The maimed creature at your feet is still alive, as evidenced by heavy breathing. It was a woman once, flaunting a military-style buzz cut and equipped for the battle. But now her skin is torn by the metal sticking out of her body in a dozen places.{/n}

{n}The maimed creature at your feet is still alive, as evidenced by its heavy breathing. It was a woman once, sporting close-cropped hair and equipped for battle. But now her skin is shredded by the metal sticking out of her body in a dozen places.{/n}

{n}The maimed creature at your feet is still alive, as evidenced by its heavy breathing. It was a woman once, sporting close-cropped hair and equipped for battle. But now her skin is shredded by the metal sticking out of her body in a dozen places.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La créature mutilée à vos pieds est toujours en vie, comme le prouve sa respiration laborieuse. C'était autrefois une femme, dotée d'une coupe militaire et d'un équipement de combat, mais à présent, sa peau est déchirée à des dizaines d'endroits par des morceaux de métal qui sortent de son corps.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The maimed creature at your feet is still alive, as evidenced by its heavy breathing. It was a woman once, sporting close-cropped hair and equipped for battle. But now her skin is shredded by the metal sticking out of her body in a dozen places.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La créature mutilée à vos pieds est toujours en vie, comme le prouve sa respiration laborieuse. C'était autrefois une femme et plus précisément un soldat, d'après sa coupe militaire et son équipement de combat, mais à présent, sa peau est déchirée à des dizaines d'endroits par des morceaux de métal qui sortent de son corps.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La criatura mutilada que tienes a tus pies sigue viva, como bien indica su entrecortada respiración. En su momento fue una mujer con un pelo corto, armada para la batalla. No obstante, ahora su piel queda desgarrada por el metal que sobresale de su cuerpo por incontables lugares.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The maimed creature at your feet is still alive, as evidenced by its heavy breathing. It was a woman once, sporting close-cropped hair and equipped for battle. But now her skin is shredded by the metal sticking out of her body in a dozen places.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La criatura mutilada que tienes a tus pies sigue viva, como bien indica su entrecortada respiración. En su momento fue una mujer con un corte de pelo militar y armada para la batalla. No obstante, ahora su piel queda desgarrada por el metal que sobresale de su cuerpo por incontables lugares.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你脚下这只扭曲的生物发出粗重的呼吸声，表明她还活着。她曾是个女性人类，梳着寸头，穿着精良的装备。可现在，无数金属将她的身体扯得四分五裂，整个身体布满了十几处撕开的伤口。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The maimed creature at your feet is still alive, as evidenced by its heavy breathing. It was a woman once, sporting close-cropped hair and equipped for battle. But now her skin is shredded by the metal sticking out of her body in a dozen places.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你脚下这只扭曲的生物发出粗重的呼吸声，表明她还活着。她曾是个女性人类，梳着军队风格的寸头，穿着精良的装备。可现在，无数金属从她的身体里刺了出来，整个身体布满了十几处撕开的伤口。{/n}

languages.text: {n}足元の傷ついた生物は、息が荒いことからもわかるように、まだ生きている。それは、かつては女性で、刈り上げの髪をしており、戦闘用の装備をしていた。しかし今、彼女の皮膚は、体から十数か所突き出た金属によって引き裂かれている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The maimed creature at your feet is still alive, as evidenced by its heavy breathing. It was a woman once, sporting close-cropped hair and equipped for battle. But now her skin is shredded by the metal sticking out of her body in a dozen places.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}足元の傷ついた生物は、息が荒いことからもわかるように、まだ生きている。それは、かつては女性で、ミリタリースタイルの髪型で、戦闘用に備えもしていた。しかし今、彼女の皮膚は、体から十数か所突き出た金属によって引き裂かれている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die verstümmelte Kreatur vor deinen Füßen ist noch am Leben, was an den schweren Atemzügen zu erkennen ist. Sie war einmal eine Frau, mit kurz geschorenen Haaren und für den Kampf gerüstet. Doch nun ist ihre Haut durch das Metall zerrissen, das an einem dutzend Stellen aus ihrem Körper ragt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The maimed creature at your feet is still alive, as evidenced by its heavy breathing. It was a woman once, sporting close-cropped hair and equipped for battle. But now her skin is shredded by the metal sticking out of her body in a dozen places.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die verstümmelte Kreatur vor deinen Füßen ist noch am Leben, was an den schweren Atemzügen zu erkennen ist. Sie war einmal eine Frau, mit einer militärischen Kurzhaarfrisur und für einen Kampfeinsatz ausgerüstet. Doch nun ist ihre Haut durch das Metall zerrissen, das an einem dutzend Stellen aus ihrem Körper ragt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Önündeki yaralı yaratık, ağır ağır nefes alıp verişine bakılırsa hâlâ yaşıyor. Bir zamanlar kısa saçlı ve savaşa hazır bir kadınmış. Fakat şimdi vücudunun dört bir yanından fışkıran metallerle paramparça olmuş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The maimed creature at your feet is still alive, as evidenced by its heavy breathing. It was a woman once, sporting close-cropped hair and equipped for battle. But now her skin is shredded by the metal sticking out of her body in a dozen places.{/n}
